<template>
  <el-form label-width="120px">
    <el-form-item :label="$t('setting.blog.url')">
      <el-input/>
    </el-form-item>

    <el-form-item :label="$t('setting.blog.username')">
      <el-input v-model="username"/>
    </el-form-item>

    <el-form-item :label="$t('setting.blog.password')">
      <el-input v-model="password"/>
    </el-form-item>

    <el-form-item :label="$t('setting.blog.apiurl')">
      <el-input/>
    </el-form-item>

    <el-form-item>
      <el-button type="primary">{{ $t('setting.blog.validate') }}</el-button>
    </el-form-item>

    <el-form-item>
      <el-button type="primary" @click="saveConf">{{ $t('setting.blog.save') }}</el-button>
      <el-button>{{ $t('setting.blog.cancel') }}</el-button>
    </el-form-item>
  </el-form>
</template>

<script>
import {getConf} from "@/lib/config";
import PUBLISH_TYPE_CONSTANTS from "@/lib/publish/publishUtil";

export default {
  name: "JVueSetting",
  data() {
    return {
      username: "",
      password: ""
    }
  },
  async created() {
    await this.initConf()
  },
  methods: {
    initConf() {
      const conf = getConf(PUBLISH_TYPE_CONSTANTS.API_TYPE_JVUE)
      console.log("conf=>", conf)
    },
    async saveConf() {
      // await setConf(PUBLISH_TYPE_CONSTANTS.API_TYPE_JVUE, [
      //   {
      //     key: "jvuePublishUsername",
      //     value: this.username
      //   }, {
      //     key: "jvuePublishPassword",
      //     value: this.password
      //   }
      // ])
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
